duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely deliver liquid and bulk helium to Air Products plants and customers throughout the US and Canada.
Delivery will include drop and hook of liquid helium containers and some pressure offloading of bulk helium and liquid nitrogen.
Be able to work in a TEAM driving environment, delivering product coast-to-coast.
Get a minimum of two loads per week, with scheduled home time. Out for 3 weeks and home for 5 days.

education_certification.credential: Valid CDL Class A with Tanker and Hazmat endorsements
